lines.line: Our world was cursed.
Everyone left abandoning this cursed land.
Have to repel evil things to release curse.
Evils wake up in the holy place.
You are the last warrior.
Please may hope come back to defeat the evils.
MOVE: WASD / ↑←↓→ ATTACK: T POTION: Q TALK: SPACE
(next floor)
(Scene change)
There are not enough pieces of memory to read. You have to gather all of the pieces of memory.
The warriors who left for the temple didn't return.
I can't believe the most affluent town a few years ago is so quiet.
You're the only young man left in town now.
Be a warrior and bring back the cursed temple.
Take this cane with you.
(You got a cane!)
Only those jewels can save our town.
please take care of yourself...
Boy! where are you going?
Are you going to that dangerous temple?
I've seen many warriors bravely go to the temple to save the village.
But nobody can't coming back!
Anyway... You also won't be able to come back too...
Oh... This was just a word to myself. Did you hear that? Hmmhmm
Well, after all, no one realizes our fault... Sigh...
It's easier than you think, right?
Well, good luck!
Hey, you. You're not supposed to be here. Go back to the village.
What? You're a warrior?
I can't believe they're sending such a young child. It seems that there situation is serious...
Go back, anyway! This is no place for kids to come!
Stop! You can't go in there!
Hey, hey... Where are you going?
Oh my God... Finally He's in there.
Well, after all, no one realizes our fault... Sigh...
(Next floor)
(Scene change)
You arrived at the temple safely!
Did You meet somebody in front of the temple?
Forget it. It's just one of those people who has regrets
By the way!
Isn't your heart pounding because of beginning of the adventure?
There'll be scary monsters waiting for you on every floor.
To meet the boss on each floor, you have to defeat the two followers.
For example, on this first floor, you have to get rid of monster hanging around the door and mummy.
You look scared! But you don't need to worry if you gain experience step by step from now on.
I'll give you a tip because you seem too afraid.
「Go into every room here.」
Well, in the little rooms, you might get some hints that make your dream come true. Conquer the temple!
Then I wish you all the best in your adventure!
Strangers looking for a new land to live come across people with the jewels
The jewels could make people become rich.
People with the jewels could live with strangers in harmon.
But strangers gradually found the convenience of the jewels and eventually became obsessed with the desire to own them.
Is it you who woke me up?
Where are all my friends..? I don't feel any sign of my friends.
What have you done to my friends?
What?
Did you bring this puzzle after killing my friends?
Then you are no different.
You're just like them. You're no different from the people in the past!
Wha, How did you get up here?
What about the land boss on the first floor?
Oh.. you're quite a piece of work. I've underestimated you too much.
However, monsters become stronger as you head upstairs of the temple.
From now on, you really don't know when you're gonna die. *Giggle
I'll give you a present for coming up here!
There is a 「TREASURE BOX」 on this floor.
Go back to town with the treasure, boy.
I don't want to drive young to death.
Hmm.. Good luck!
The strangers have begun to fill their greed by using the jewels.
Because of the endless greed of the strangers, the jewels was used indiscriminately.
The strangers neglected their fields and livestocks.
They just ate, drank and danced, while making their food and drinks overflowingly.
Humans, who have become everything easy, have forgotten how to thank.
Furthermore, these strangers have no longer accepted other refugees who are similar to their former appearances.
The natives could not hide their disappointment at the attitude of these humans.
However, everything has its price
Who are you?
What!? Human?
Don’t come in!
I thought humans only knew how to eat, drink and play every day, but now you're awake?
I can't give jewelry to a selfish human being.
Go out right now!
I can't believe it...
I can't believe you a little kid came all the way here.. It's a little annoying.
But this floor will be the last of your luck
The boss on this floor is waiting for you in a dark place that is completely blind...
When the light goes out, you have to find the 「SWITCH」 and turn it on to deal with the boss.
The switch is not accessible in the usual way.
It won't be easy to find a portal to go there
It's annoying to remove the dead body everytime, but I'm looking forward to it since it's been a while to do that kinda stuff on this floor!
The natives warned the strangers about the cost of using jewels, but the strangers only focused on immediate benefits.
The jewels made their villages rich, but the other villages were becoming desolate.
The greed of the strangers have made the jewels darker and darker.
Eventually the natives stole jewels from humans and hid in a temple.
Blackened jewels turned the natives into monsters.
And the village that lost its jewels was becoming more and more dilapidated.
Umm... why is it so bright?
Did you turn on the light?
Looks like you managed to get the jewels of the earth and the water.
Apparently you are learning the secrets of our past...
Why do you keep challenging us? The closer you come to the truth, the more painful you are.
..... But that's your choice.
Your luck is over.
Are you afraid of those in the temple?
Do you know the memories of the past?
Do you think your actions are right thing?
Huh..?
Wow! It's been a while since I've seen a challenger!
Good to see you!
Me? Umm... Just call me a 'COOL' mask. HAHAHA.
You look young... How did you get here?
Uh... OK. Then I'll give you some useful information that will help the challenger.
That's the role of a 'COOL' mask!
Well, my boss doesn't usually get damaged! We can only attack when the shield is broken.
He likes to deceive others and enjoys manipulating them. Even if you're pushing yourself.
Our boss has mastered replicating himself for a long time.
The others of this temple don't know.
But I know. That's the real boss that changed his face!
Did I say too much?
Nothing comes back even if I help you.
Don't doubt what I'm saying though.
I just hope we understand each other on an equal footing!
I believe in your choice!
You can't see it anymore.
It was one winter day that the strangers visited the village.
We allowed them to stay until spring came.
At the end of winter the strangers pleaded.
There are so many people who can't move anymore, so let them live on the side of the village.
This land, where abundant land, clear rain and cool wind were together, belonged to everyone, not just us.
We allowed them to live on this land.
We had jewels of mysterious power.
They were three jewels that made the land rich and allowed all things to breathe.
It took a price to use the power of jewelry.
If our land is enriched with jewels, the land somewhere will lose its vitality.
If it rains with jewels on our land, the heat will continue on other lands.
If you use jewelry to let the wind blow on our land, it will be hard to breathe on other lands.
And one day the jewel disappeared.
We've never seen it, but we're sure. The jewels were in the hands of strangers.
The stranger's village became more and more abundant. There was a flood of food and drinks and the banquet was not over until late at night.
Gradually we felt the ground, rain and wind disappear.
We sent those who would retrieve the jewels to the party of strangers.
The jewels returned to our arms, but the murky jewels distorted us.
The result of jewelry with false desires returned to us, not strangers.
Maybe it was at the cost of losing the jewelry. But how about they...?
We built a temple where only the brave could enter.
We hid ourselves in the temple.
There will be no more gems going out into the world.
The jewels will be in our hands until the day we are decrepit and disappear from the earth.
Jewelry will find its light again when all the residents are gone.
You finally come here!
I've been waiting you for a long time.
It was just a playful suggestion...
I didn't think you're possible to come up to the top floor.
To show my respect to you, I'll greet you with my true self.
(An animation that changes from scarecrow to boss)
Let me introduce myself.
It's a shadow of tragedy that represents everyone stained by someone's greed.
Please accept my sincerity to you who followed me to the end of the story.
Doesn't you the boy... regret it?
Don't you think we're pathetic?
Can't you also see the truth?
Why... do we have to suffer alone like this...?
At least one of them will no longer suffer from your actions.
I don't know if your choice is true or ignorant.
But anyway, I'm satisfied to see the end of that choice.
Congratulations, by the way. You are a great warrior.
Would you like to take out three jewels?
At least one of them will no longer suffer from your actions.
I don't know if your choice is true or ignorant.
But anyway, I'm satisfied to see the end of that choice.
Congratulations, by the way. You are a great warrior.
Now you can leave here.
The boy left the temple without regret.
The boy realized that jewels were not his own.
The jewels has become a temple thing again.
Although the village has not regained its energy, the boy knows this is the right thing to do.
END
END
The boy went back to the village with the jewels.
Hooray for the great hero!
Now the land in the village is fertile, the water is clean, and the air is clear.
The village was peaceful and happy for a long time.
END
END
The boy went back to town with jewelry.
The villagers and his mother were very happy and the boy became a hero.
The village, which regained its jewels, was enriched again.
But the warrior's heart was empty.
END
END
Move: ↑←↓→ , Attack/Talk: Big button at the bottom right, Potion: Small button at the bottom right
